name: P90X
description: P90X, or Power 90 Extreme, is a commercial home exercise regimen created by Tony Horton. Developed as a successor to the program called "Power 90", it is designed to take 90 days, and consists of a training program that uses cross-training and periodization, combined with a nutrition and dietary supplement plan.
